paper_abstract: We show counterexamples exist to confluence modulo hypercollapsing subterms, fair normalisation, and the normal form property in orthogonal infinitary higher-order rewriting with non-fully-extended rules. This sets these systems apart from both fully-extended and finite systems, where no such counterexamples are possible. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Counterexamples in infinitary rewriting with non-fully-extended rules
